about_the_game:
You have fond memories of a 3d platformer you played many years ago and late one night you went looking online for a playable version. Hmm. The only source was a sketchy-looking file-hosting site buried deep in the bowels of the dark web.

Does that mean it's dripping with viruses? What are the chances the game is gonna actually work?

Eh, why not?

The download went smoothly and the emulator loaded the file just fine. Maybe this is the actual game after all.

Well, time to give it a shot. What could go wrong?



Explore part of a retro 3D platformer where you play as a minion of the Grim Reaper filling in on his vacation. Collect souls from an abandoned mansion turned grand hotel and reminisce about games from days gone by. But in true Creepypasta fashion, this old game file houses an angry spirit who doesn't play by the rules.

Note: The "game emulator" aspects of Mini Reaper are purely fictional, and for aesthetic purposes only.

Features


  • Enjoy fast-paced and tightly controlled 3D platformer gameplay!
  • One large interconnected mansion map to explore!
  • Crunchy retro visuals!
  • Short and sweet chaser-horror experience: about 1 hour total experience
  • A smart "nextbot" inspired monster with deep behavior and decision-making!

short_description: Inspired by classic video game Creepypastas, in Mini Reaper, you'll run, hop, and explore through a fictional retro 3D platformer. Collect lost souls for the Grim Reaper, but be sure to avoid anything that might be haunting the old game.
